pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:4.1: 10. The training rule on renouncing the training
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:5.1: At one time the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:5.2: At that time the nun Caṇḍakāḷī had argued with the nuns, and in anger she said this:
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:5.3: “I renounce the Buddha, I renounce the Teaching, I renounce the Order, I renounce the training.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:5.4: How are they ascetics these Sakyan daughters? There are other ascetics who have a sense of conscience, who are afraid of wrongdoing and fond of the training; I’ll practice the spiritual life together with them.”
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:6.1: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized her,
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:6.2: “How could the nun Caṇḍakāḷī say this in anger:
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:6.3: ‘I renounce the Buddha, I renounce the Teaching, I renounce the Order, I renounce the training.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:6.4: How are they ascetics these Sakyan daughters? There are other ascetics who have a sense of conscience, who are afraid of wrongdoing and fond of the training; I’ll practice the spiritual life together with them’?” …
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:6.5: “Is it true, monks, that the nun Caṇḍakāḷī said this in anger?”
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:6.10: How can the nun Caṇḍakāḷī say this in anger:
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:6.11: ‘I renounce the Buddha, I renounce the Teaching, I renounce the Order, I renounce the training.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:6.12: How are they ascetics these Sakyan daughters? There are other ascetics who have a sense of conscience, who are afraid of wrongdoing and fond of the training; I’ll practice the spiritual life together with them’?
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:6.13: This will not give rise to confidence in those without it …
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:6.14: And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule thus:
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:7.2: “I renounce the Buddha, I renounce the Teaching, I renounce the Order, I renounce the training. How are they ascetics these Sakyan daughters? There are other ascetics who have a sense of conscience, who are afraid of wrongdoing and fond of the training; I’ll practice the spiritual life together with them,”
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:7.3: then the nuns should correct her in this way:
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:7.4: “Venerable, don’t say such a thing in anger, ‘I renounce the Buddha, I renounce the Teaching, I renounce the Order, I renounce the training. How are they ascetics these Sakyan daughters? There are other ascetics who have a sense of conscience, who are afraid of wrongdoing and fond of the training; I’ll practice the spiritual life together with them.’ Take delight, Venerable, the Teaching is well proclaimed. Practice the spiritual life for the complete ending of suffering.”
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:7.5: If that nun still continues as before, the nuns should press her up to three times to make her stop.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:7.6: If she then stops, all is well.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:7.7: If not, then that nun too has committed a third-time offense entailing sending away and suspension.’”
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:8.4: … The nun who has been given the full ordination by both complete Orders through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.

pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:13.1: ‘Please, Venerables, I ask the Order to listen.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:13.2: This nun so-and-so says this in anger:

pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:13.6: And she keeps on doing it.

pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:14.1: Please, Venerables, I ask the Order to listen.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:14.2: This nun so-and-so says this in anger:
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:14.3: “I renounce the Buddha, I renounce the Teaching, I renounce the Order, I renounce the training.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:14.4: How are they ascetics these Sakyan daughters?

pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:14.8: Any nun who approves of pressing her to make her stop should remain silent.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:14.9: Any nun who does not approve should speak up.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:15.1: For the second time I speak on this matter …
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:15.2: For the third time I speak on this matter …
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:16.1: This nun so-and-so has been pressed by the Order to make her stop.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:16.2: The Order approves and is therefore silent. I will remember it thus.’”
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:17.1: After the motion, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:17.2: After each of the first two announcements, she commits a serious offense.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:17.3: When the last announcement is finished, she commits an offense entailing suspension.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:17.4: For one who commits the offense entailing suspension, the offense of wrong conduct and the serious offenses are annulled.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:18.2: this is said with reference to the preceding offenses.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:19.2: there is an offense when she has been pressed for the third time, not as soon as the misconduct has been committed.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:20.2: she is sent away from the Order.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:21.2: … Therefore, too, it is called an offense entailing suspension.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:22.1: If it is a legitimate legal procedure, and she perceives it as legitimate, and she does not stop, she commits an offense entailing suspension.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:22.2: If it is a legitimate legal procedure, but she is unsure if it is, and she does not stop, she commits an offense entailing suspension.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:22.3: If it is a legitimate legal procedure, but she perceives it as illegitimate, and she does not stop, she commits an offense entailing suspension.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:23.1: If it is an illegitimate legal procedure, but she perceives it as legitimate, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:23.2: If it is an illegitimate legal procedure, but she is unsure if it is, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:23.3: If it is an illegitimate legal procedure, and she perceives it as illegitimate, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:24.2: if she has not been pressed;
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:24.5: if she is the first offender.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss10:25.1: The tenth offense entailing suspension is finished.
